description:
The best and easiest way to print your photos directly from your phone. Give a new life to your photos in a snap (prints, photobooks, posters...). Incredible gifts. Worldwide shipping. 

"Top 50 apps in the world" - GQ Magazine 
"The perfect application for photo fans" - Madame Figaro
"The must have app" - Glamour

Award winning app. Hundreds of thousands of downloads. 

Polagram has been featured in the AppStore, as well as in the press many times: ELLE, Glamour, MyLittleParis, Ventes-Privées, TV... 

••• GIVE YOUR iPHONE, FACEBOOK AND INSTAGRAM PHOTOS A NEW LIFE ••• 

Polagram is the easiest and fastest way to print and send your photos directly to your door or to make personalized gifts in less than 2 minutes! 

- Choose your product 
- Select your photos from your camera roll, Facebook or Instagram 
- And quickly send your prints – we offer worldwide shipping 

Then, keep an eye on your mailbox for our pink envelope!

••• A WIDE RANGE OF PRODUCTS ••• 

- Our Lovely prints:
Classic Square 10x10cm (4x4") 
Regular 10x13cm (4x5") 
Vintage Pola style

- Our Large prints:
Classic Square 20x20 (8x8") 
Regular 20x27 (8x10") 

- The Poster:
Think big with our 50x70cm (20x30") poster: 35 photos, thick high quality paper. Print your weekend or your holidays in a snap! 

- The Photobook:
26 pages / 26 photos. Create a unique photobook in less than 3 minutes. Hard cover 21x21cm (8x8"), high quality paper

- The Calendar: 
20x20cm (8"x8"), high quality paper. Perfect to decorate your walls or to offer

- iPhone cases: 
Customize your iphone 4/4S/5/5S with our unique, matt finish, high quality scratch-resistant cases.

••• EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY ••• 

Your photos will be processed by our professional labs to ensure the highest print quality. We are obsessed with quality, so only use the very best materials!

Orders are shipped within 24-72 hours depending on the product. (Worldwide shipping).

••• FEATURES ••• 

- Express delivery right to your door.
- Select photos from Facebook and Instagram
- Gift cards available (from 5€ to 50€) 
- Option to include a personal message with your order 
- Secure payment by credit card and PayPal
- Opportunity to refer and earn Polagram credits

••• READ OUR 5-STAR REVIEWS ••• 

More than 2500 5-star reviews on the AppStore. 
Over 95% of our users recommend Polagram

“Using it all the time! Everyone loves it! For yourself or a gift! Perfect!!” lulurak. 
“Nothing much to say, except this app rocks!!” Auguste R.
“Amazing as it is!” Alessiarux.

••• INCREDIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE ••• 

As you would expect, there are real humans answering you. If you have any question, suggestions or just want to say hello, please don't hesitate to contact us! We would be very happy have a talk with you. Just email us at: contact@polagr.am

••• ABOUT POLAGRAM ••• 

Founded in 2012, Polagram is an innovative photo company created by three passionate photographers. Polagram merged the smartphone world with the traditional photo industry to provide a fun and simple photo experience. Always focused on high-quality products, Polagram is present in 50 countries, including Europe.

releaseNotes:
Enjoy celebrations earlier with Polagram:
Referral and payment pages have been redesigned, 
Fixed the issue with the Calendar (hard to rearrange photos for some users),
Fixed a issue with payment (error 170),
Minor bug fixes and improvements
Many new features will be available with our next update. Stay tuned! 
Any comments? Any suggestions? Problem? Continue to write us at contact@polagr.am!
Have a beautiful week,
The Polagram Team.
